input.sentences: [male] was on his way to work on his bike when he was distracted by a bird .
the tan bird was standing peacefully in the grass . [male] could n't help but watch it . he followed it all the way to a horse .
this horse was behind a fence in the older part of town . the horse advised him to go shopping .
he purchased a green dress for his mother . he still had not made it to work .
finally he returned home and ate dinner with his friends in a poorly lit living room .
output.sentences: The male on the motor bike was distracted by the bird.
The tan bird was just standing trying to watch for worms.
I was riding my horse to town for some shopping.
I purchase my mother a beautiful green dress.
We returned home to happy to not be poorly living.
